member.name: T:Keen.VRage.AutoTest.EngineComponents.AutoTestEngineComponent
member.summary: Controls screenshots queue with frame counts. Used for automated testing

member.name: M:Keen.VRage.AutoTest.EngineComponents.AutoTestEngineComponent.UpdateScreenshotQueue
member.summary: Queue will issue a Screenshot command to the Render for all previously specified screenshot requests that has lower or equal frame id than the current frame count

member.name: P:Keen.VRage.AutoTest.IAutoTestScenario.IsLoading
member.summary: Is the test in a loading phase that should delay screenshots.

member.name: P:Keen.VRage.AutoTest.IAutoTestScenario.ScreenshotFrames
member.summary: List of frame numbers in which screenshots should be done.

member.name: M:Keen.VRage.AutoTest.IAutoTestScenario.GetScreenshotFolder
member.summary: Return relative path of folder to put screenshots in. By default, screenshots are put in folder named after the test

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.SetStateMachine(System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IAsyncStateMachine)
member.summary: Set the boxed state machine, unused.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.SetException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Notify about an exception while executing the state machine.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.SetResult
member.summary: Signal that the state machine has completed.
